roleset.name: to use wrongly or hurt by maltreatment

example.name: transitive
example.text: These are the families who [*T*-1] used [*RNR*-3] -- and sometime abused [*RNR*-3] -- their sharecroppers , people who [*T*-2] had no encouragement and little access to an education or training for a better life .
example.arg: [*RNR*-3] (= their sharecroppers , people who [*T*-2] had no encouragement and little access to an education or training for a better life)

roleset.note: Member of Vncls judgement-33. FNcls Abusing.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'abuse' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
